verses.name: John 18:25
verses.text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself. They said therefore unto him, Art not thou also one of his disciples? He denied it, and said, I am not.

verses.name: John 18:26
verses.text: One of the servants of the high priest, being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off, saith, Did not I see thee in the garden with him?

verses.name: John 18:27
verses.text: Peter then denied again: and immediately the cock crew.

verses.name: John 18:28
verses.text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment: and it was early; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall, lest they should be defiled; but that they might eat the passover.
